sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Dropdown } from 'carbon-components-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Restart16, ArrowRight16 } from '@carbon/icons-react'; import moment from 'moment'; import './overview-page.scss' import PercentRing from "../../components/PercentRing" import OverviewTable from "../../components/OverviewTable" export default class OverviewPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { lastUpdated: moment().format('h:mm A'), maxTopicCount: 955, mostCommonData: [ {label: "Pay Bill", count: 955}, {label: "Account Information", count: 635}, {label: "#OpenAccount", count: 555}, {label: "Budgeting Plan", count: 499}, {label: "Dispute a charge", count: 450}, {label: "Payment Deferral", count: 375}, {label: "Refinance", count: 350}, {label: "Frequently asked questions", count: 290}, {label: "Mortage loan", count: 200}, {label: "Transfer money", count: 190}, ], leastCommonData: [ {label: "Pay Bill", count: 0}, {label: "Account Information", count: 0}, {label: "#OpenAccount", count: 0}, {label: "Budgeting Plan", count: 5}, {label: "Dispute a charge", count: 10}, {label: "Payment Deferral", count: 20}, {label: "Refinance", count: 50}, {label: "Frequently asked questions", count: 55}, {label: "Mortage loan", count: 65}, {label: "Transfer money", count: 75}, ], } } render() { const dividerStyle = {width: "100%", height: "1px", background: "#f4f4f4", marginTop: "24px"} return
